title: Good ol' PC music (retro MIDI synth)
description: 90's PC retro music in various styles (Atmospheric, Casual, Detective, Medieval, Nervous, Ominous/horror, Upbeat/fast tempo, and more)
longDescription:
preview here


This pack contains only authentic "MIDI" music, which is a perfect fit for an adventure game.


Composed by using exclusively a very popular vintage synth in 90's gaming industry, that's why it sounds very authentic.


No less than 23 original tracks (+ 6 jingles bonus) inspired by classic PC games from the 90's glorious era.


All seamless loops of Atmospheric, Casual, Detective, Medieval, Nervous, Ominous/horror, Upbeat/fast tempo, and Various other styles.


More than 30 minutes of original music.
